text: Markus Maier (27 June 1911 - 2 January 2010) was an Austrian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Austrian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Austria Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Markus Maier
